column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our trip to Chicago included a visit to this well known pizza place. We came in on a weekday afternoon so there was no line
column2: but the restaurant was almost full. We started with the fried calamari which is so tender and crispy
column3: tasty with the sauces. The minestrone soup was the best I've ever had. Then came the main event the deep dish which was very good.
